law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 138, sec. 2, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 2, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 38, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 180, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 410, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 516, sec. 15, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 425, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 417, sec. 4, effective April 13, 1984.
